We are huge fans of Gaston Acurio's (we have visited his restaurants in San Francisco, Miami, Madrid, Cusco, and Lima) restaurants and this was a let down. It was very, very casual and didn't have the same vibe as his other spots.The service was in need of some work. Our server forgot things several times and it got old.The food was good and not great.Overall it was disappointing for such a great restaurateur.
